english.segment1: Oh God I need you. Oh God I need you here with me. I know You hear me. You're my hope, oh love my days (x2)
english.segment2: Chorus: Jesus. Savior. Protector of my soul. Oooh Messiah. You're the shelter in the storm. in the storm
english.segment3: Oh God I love You. Oh God I love to speak Your name. I know You hear me. You're my hope, oh love my days (x2)
english.segment5: I will be watching, waiting still. 'Till Your love comes back for me
english.segment6: I will be watching, waiting still. 'Till your love come rescuing (x2)
